column5: Was wondering if anyone has tried these. Are they worth the money? etc. I can get one new for 630.00 S+H included. I thought it might be handy for early morning fishing when I take my 26 footer up the river for the weekend.
There are a few Pelican owners on Yakfisher.net, they seem to be happy with their choices. Drop by the site and ask the same question, I'm sure you'll get an informed answer shortly.
